backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, challenge sessions, ICP transactions, and access‑controlled query/update methods including leaderboard, profile management, and competition state.
feature_evidence.json: Stub feature evidence report with an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists high‑level summaries for all frontend components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes plus global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, backend actor connection, profile loading, routing, and error states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text and a caffeine.ai link with icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing branding, navigation buttons, user info, admin badge, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a new user profile with first‑user admin logic and validation.
frontend/src/components/SendICPPrizeModa: Modal form for sending ICP prizes, handling validation, submission, and success states using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/SetAppPrincipalM: Empty file or placeholder for a modal to set the app’s canister principal.
frontend/src/config/appIdentity.ts: Resolves the app canister principal from environment variables and derives its account ID using ICP utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/clear functions, and initializes identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, sessions, admin checks, and ICP prize actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining dark and light theme CSS variables and global layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/accountId.ts: Implements ICP account identifier creation using SHA-224 hashing, CRC32 checksums, and principal conversion.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin interface to control competition state, view canister identity, balance, and transaction history, and send ICP prizes.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays the global leaderboard sorted by top XP scores with rank icons and a return button.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with public leaderboard preview and feature highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenu.tsx: Main navigation menu linking to challenge, stats, wallet, and leaderboard pages.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Shows user challenge statistics including total XP, averages, and a table of past sessions.
frontend/src/pages/TypingChallenge.tsx: Implements the multi‑level typing challenge, calculating metrics and saving completed sessions.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: React wallet page showing user profile, ICP balance, withdrawal form, and copy-to-clipboard utilities using custom hooks.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines UserProfile type matching backend structure with username, principal, accountId, and admin flag.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project metadata, issues, and a feature request to redeploy the backend as a new canister.
